columns.name: CASE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the case request record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: CASE_VENDOR_REQ
columns.description: This item stores vendor request information.

columns.name: CASE_VENDOR_NAME
columns.description: This item stores the vendor name.

columns.name: CASE_VENDOR_DATE
columns.description: This item stores the date on which the vendor was contacted.

columns.name: CASE_VENDOR_ARRANGE
columns.description: This item stores information about who made arrangements with the vendor.

columns.name: CASE_VENDOR_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description: This item stores the status of the vendor request.

columns.name: CASE_VENDOR_NAME_C_NAME
columns.description: This item stores the vendor name.
